animeTitle: The Humanoid: Ai no Wakusei Lezeria
animeDescription: Dr. Watson has created his masterpiece – a beautiful woman made of metal. A wonder of science, Antoinette is a childlike innocent who holds the key to an ancient civilization that could save the world, or destroy it. And when a mad tyrant kidnaps the man she loves, Antoinette finally discovers the courage – and the amazing fighting skills – that are her true calling.
animeVoices: ['Sakakibara, Yoshiko', 'Shibata, Yumiko', 'Yao, Kazuki', 'Kobayashi, Kiyoshi', 'Akiyama, Runa', 'Shibata, Hidekatsu', 'Sogabe, Kazuyuki', 'Maruyama, Eiji']
animeStaff: [['Masaki Shinichi', ['Director']], ['Matsuura Noriyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Kageyama Shigenori', ['Co-Producer']], ['Katsumata Geki', ['Art Director']]]
